prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Reed, Drums, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a Synth Pad, Reed, Drums, and Guitar, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of a Synth Pad, Reed, Drums, and Guitar, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, but it does have a Synth Pad, Reed, Drums, and Guitar.
